display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (NREM): (Apneas with >= 2% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 2% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hours of NREM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM) associated with >= 2% desaturation) / (hours of non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM))]
calculation: 60*(hnrbp2 + hnrop2 + canbp2 + canop2 + oanbp2 + oanop2 + manrbp2 + manrop2) / (slpprdp - minremp)
